cfi.prompt: Please rate how much you agree with the following statements. There are no right or wrong answers.

questions.prompt: I am good at "sizing up" situations.
questions.name: item1

questions.prompt: I have a hard time making decisions when faced with difficult situations.
questions.name: item2

questions.prompt: I consider multiple options making a decision.
questions.name: item3

questions.prompt: When I encounter difficult situations, I feel like I am losing control.
questions.name: item4

questions.prompt: I like to look at difficult situations from many different angles.
questions.name: item5

questions.prompt: I seek additional information not immediately available before attributing causes to behaviour.
questions.name: item6

questions.prompt: Select the left-most option, strongly disagree, for this question.
questions.name: catch

questions.prompt: When encountering difficult situations, I become so stressed that I cannot think of a way to resolve the situation.
questions.name: item7

questions.prompt: I try to think about things from another person’s point of view.
questions.name: item8

questions.prompt: I find it troublesome that there are so many different ways to deal with difficult situations.
questions.name: item9

questions.prompt: I am good at putting myself in others’ shoes.
questions.name: item10

questions.prompt: When I encounter difficult situations, I just don’t know what to do.
questions.name: item11

questions.prompt: It is important to look at difficult situations from many angles.
questions.name: item12

questions.prompt: When in difficult situations, I consider multiple options before deciding how to behave.
questions.name: item13

questions.prompt: I often look at a situation from different viewpoints.
questions.name: item14

questions.prompt: I am capable of overcoming the difficulties in life that I face.
questions.name: item15

questions.prompt: I consider all the available facts and information when attributing causes to behaviour.
questions.name: item16

questions.prompt: I feel I have no power to change things in difficult situations.
questions.name: item17

questions.prompt: When I encounter difficult situations, I stop and try to think of several ways to resolve it.
questions.name: item18

questions.prompt: I can think of more than one way to resolve a difficult situation I’m confronted with.
questions.name: item19

questions.prompt: I consider multiple options before responding to difficult situations.
questions.name: item20
